meaning_str.bing:
adv. 然而；不过；无论如何；不管怎样
conj. 不管用什么方法；〈古〉虽然
网络. 可是；但是；转折

然而；不过；无论如何；不管怎样
不管用什么方法；〈古〉虽然

然而；尽管如此；不过；无论如何；不管怎样；不论多么；以任何方式；不管用什么方法；不管到什么程度；不论怎样
然而；尽管如此；不过；无论如何；不管怎样；即使如此；虽然如此；不论怎样

1.en: He feared, however, that it would not be too long before the young man headed back to his native Uzbekistan to open his own bakery.
1.cn: 可是，他担心这位年轻的小伙子不久将回到自己的祖国乌兹别克斯坦开自己的面包房。

2.en: What dog dog home page acquiesces now still is all search, result page increased webpage search apparently however.
2.cn: 现在狗狗首页默认的还是全部搜索，结果页却显然增加了网页搜索。

3.en: It's probably worth pointing out, however, that the Sun is not exactly known as a hotbed of serious environmental journalism.
3.cn: 然而，或许值得指出的是，太阳报并不被认为是一个会发布严重的环境问题的新闻团体。

0.en: However, the components of the universe can still affect its eventual fate.
0.cn: 然而组成宇宙的各个部分同时也会影响其最终的命运。

1.en: Social protocol does, however, require me to bring you a hot beverage in your time of need.
1.cn: 然而鉴于人际交往的需要，我应该在你孤独的时候给你来杯热饮。

2.en: However, our examination of the vehicle did reveal a small amount of blood on the passenger side dashboard.
2.cn: 然而，我们检查了车辆并且在副驾驶仪表盘上发现了少量血液。

3.en: Did my sister give that impression? No! No. There was, however, I have to admit, the matter of your family...
3.cn: 我姐姐给你那种印象？不！不。有，然而，我不得不承认你的家人……

4.en: However, we also believe that the universe had another phase of de Sitter expansion in the earliest times of its life.
4.cn: 然而，我们也相信宇宙还存在另一个德西特膨胀阶段，它发生在宇宙形成的初期。

5.en: However, not every opinion is equally valuable. And we had to learn to distinguish between good ideas and bad ones to get the best decisions.
5.cn: 然而并不是每个观点都一样有价值。我们要学会区分好坏做出最佳决策。

6.en: However, I also learned that if you get swept up by what you are on the outside you can lose who you are on the inside.
6.cn: 然而，我也学到了一点，那就是如果你完全沉溺于自己的外在，你就会丢掉内在的自己。

7.en: However, it doesn't look like I'm gonna get this job, so I can't afford to have principles. So screw you! The tickets are ours!
7.cn: 然而，看起来我好像得不到这份工作了，所以我不能太有原则，去你们的！彩票是我们的！

8.en: However, after much deliberation, I have decided that I have more to offer you as Secretary of State than to resign and run for office.
8.cn: 然而，经过深思熟虑，我决定，与辞职参加选举相比，作为国务卿我能更好地为大家服务。

9.en: However, if crew moral is better served by my roaming the halls weeping, I would gladly defer to your medical expertise. Excuse me.
9.cn: 然而，如果大家能在我的指挥下忠诚地为星舰服务的话，我会很高兴接受你的专业医疗意见的。

10.en: However, economist David Ricardo showed that international trade could actually make everyone better off, bringing in one of the first great economic models.
10.cn: 然而，经济学家戴维?李嘉图指出国际贸易时实际上能让大家都受益，带出早期伟大的经济理念之一。

11.en: My arduous journey, however, was for naught. Although advertised to appear, he did not show up. It was at that moment, I vowed eternal hatred for Wil Wheaton.
11.cn: 然而我艰苦的旅行却一无所获，尽管广告说他会出现，却最终没来，就在那一刻，我发誓要永远憎恨威尔·惠顿。

12.en: However, this treatment remains fairly controversial as studies on rats and monkeys have shown that even small amounts of MDMA can not only destroy the endings of brain cells involved in the release of serotonin but potentially cause permanent brain damage.
12.cn: 然而，这种疗法现在还很有争议，因为对老鼠和猴子进行药物测试发现，摇头丸不只会破坏那些制造复合胺的脑细胞，还极有可能造成大脑永久损坏。

13.en: Oh, golly, however did he humiliate you?

14.en: Iracebeth, please. However would you stop people from laughing?
14.cn: 伊瑞瑟贝斯，拜托.别人要笑你能阻挡得了吗？

15.en: However, that blue represents millions of dollars and countless jobs.
15.cn: 总之，那蓝色值几千万花费了数不尽的心血。

16.en: This look like affection to you? I takes it however I gets it.
16.cn: 这看起来是表达爱意吗？我怎么理解就怎么说喽。

17.en: However, on an unrelated topic, I am never getting out of this bed again.
17.cn: 但是，从另一个方面讲，我再也抬不起头做人了。

18.en: Giving Mrs. Davis the box set of Roots was bad. However... No. Fine. Bad.
18.cn: 给戴维斯女士《根》影集的这种行为，好无礼。但是... 不行。好吧，好无礼。

19.en: Oh, excuse me, that is my mother you're talking about, however accurately.
19.cn: 喂喂喂，你刚才说的人可是我母亲，虽然描述十分正确。
